title: Cassie and The Wild Cat: Meet and Greet
description: Cassie found she had a wonderful life until this spotted wild cat entered and caused her strife. She was not about to give up without a fight and would be rid of him by night.Follow Cassie as she tries to rid herself of the Wild Cat and sweep him under the mat. From the freezer to the loo, will she chase the Wild Cat from view? Find out as you read another rhyming story from Pat Hatt starring Cassie and the Wild Cat.
author: Pat Hatt
